This appears to be the 3.0.1 build.  Have you been using 3.0.1 for a while and 
this just suddenly happened or have you just started using this build?

What other plugins do you have loaded?

(In reply to comment #1)
> This appears to be the 3.0.1 build.  Have you been using 3.0.1 for a while 
and 
> this just suddenly happened or have you just started using this build?
> What other plugins do you have loaded?


It looks like the problem occured after I installed CheckStyle plugin. But I 
was able to start Eclipse after doing the following: 1. Install Eclipse in 
different location; 2. copy .metadata/.plugin directory from my fresh install 
into my old Eclipse install.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 70322 ***
